Student spotlights >> Faculty back stories >> Alumni stories >> Diversity, Equity and Inclusion Central to the School of Engineering’s mission is a commitment to increasing diversity by supporting individuals historically excluded in the field. We welcome a diverse group of faculty, students, and staff in an environment that is nurturing, welcoming and inclusive of individuals from a variety of backgrounds, perspectives and beliefs. Learn more Degree & research opportunities With opportunities for exceptional research and mentorship and an array of majors and classes, students have the opportunity to get the most out of an experience at Stanford. We offer several degree programs , as well as research opportunities with faculty in labs and in worldwide experiences in the field. Start your application here What's it like to be a Stanford Engineering student? Learn more What is Aeronautical and Astronautical Engineering? At Stanford, the Department of Aeronautics and Astronautics integrates multiple engineering disciplines and focuses on structural, aerodynamic, propulsion, and guidance and control challenges posed by aircraft and spacecraft.
